column4: he's not having a card issue but a router issue he thinks. Thats what I was trying to explain originally that firmware on some wifi cards is loaded by the drivers.
yeah, but it could be the samething, other OS doesn't terminate the device right and next OS can't use it
well its a firmware issue that you are described causing the locking.
yeah, did dual boot while having that issue, I think it was an internal NIc or modem, don't remember exactly
